name: Junior Division - Sunset Team
description: The SFRPD Youth Flag Football League is a co-ed, non-contact league that focuses on learning and having fun. The games are played 5 vs. 5, with an emphasis on skill and technique instead of tackling. League features: -No tackling or blocking -Focus on running plays, passing plays, and route running -Players get to try different positions and build new skills Age divisions: -Future Stars Division: ages 8 to 10 -Showcase Division: ages 11 to 13 Both divisions use a 5-on-5 passing-only format in a

howToGetIt: Register online or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: San Francisco Recreation and Park Department
